DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To compare benefit structure occupational therapy intervention single geriatric therapist benefit conventional treatment model functional recovery patient admit acute geriatric unit . Design : Non-pharmacological randomised clinical trial . Setting : Acute Geriatric Unit , Albacete , Spain . Participants : The trial include 400 patient admit consecutively 6 month acute geriatric unit acute illness exacerbation chronic medical condition . Participants randomise occupational therapy intervention conventional treatment model group ; 198 patient receive occupational therapy . All patient complete study . The mean age 83.5 , 56.8 % woman . Interventions : Needs assessment , iatrogenic prevention , retrain basic instrumental activity daily live , assessment need technical aid , instruction primary caregiver patient mobilisation technique , structure social occupational motivation per protocol three group patient ( cardiopulmonary disease , stroke , condition ) 5 day week , 30 45 minute day entire hospital stay .
